verses.verse: I love <S%H157><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he has heard <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> and my supplications. <S%H8469><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> he has inclined <S%H5186><s%> his ear <S%H241><s%> to me, therefore will I call <S%H7121><s%> on him as long <S%H3117><s%> as I live. <S%H3117><s%>

The sorrows <S%H2256><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> compassed <S%H661><s%> me, and the pains <S%H4712><s%> of hell <S%H7585><s%> got hold <S%H4672><s%> on me: I found <S%H4672><s%> trouble <S%H6869><s%> and sorrow. <S%H3015><s%>
Then called <S%H7121><s%> I on the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I beseech <S%H577><s%> you, deliver <S%H4422><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
Gracious <S%H2587><s%> is the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and righteous; <S%H6662><s%> yes, our God <S%H430><s%> is merciful. <S%H7355><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> preserves <S%H8104><s%> the simple: <S%H6612><s%> I was brought <S%H1809><s%> low, <S%H1809><s%> and he helped <S%H3467><s%> me.
Return <S%H7725><s%> to your rest, <S%H4496><s%> O my soul; <S%H5315><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has dealt <S%H1580><s%> bountifully <S%H1580><s%> with you.
For you have delivered <S%H2502><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from death, <S%H4194><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%> from tears, <S%H1832><s%> and my feet <S%H7272><s%> from falling. <S%H1762><s%>
I will walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>
I believed, <S%H539><s%> therefore <S%H3588><s%> have I spoken: <S%H1696><s%> I was greatly <S%H3966><s%> afflicted: <S%H6031><s%>
I said <S%H559><s%> in my haste, <S%H2648><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> men <S%H120><s%> are liars. <S%H3576><s%>
What <S%H4100><s%> shall I render <S%H7725><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> his benefits <S%H8408><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> me?
I will take <S%H5375><s%> the cup <S%H3563><s%> of salvation, <S%H3444><s%> and call <S%H7121><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
I will pay <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> in the presence <S%H5048><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>
Precious <S%H3368><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is the death <S%H4194><s%> of his saints. <S%H2623><s%>

O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> truly <S%H577><s%> I am your servant; <S%H5650><s%> I am your servant, <S%H5650><s%> and the son <S%H1121><s%> of your handmaid: <S%H519><s%> you have loosed <S%H6605><s%> my bonds. <S%H4147><s%>
I will offer <S%H2076><s%> to you the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> and will call <S%H7121><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
I will pay <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> in the presence <S%H5048><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>
In the courts <S%H2691><s%> of the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you, O Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
